if.test: pager!=null and pager.rangeField!=null and pager.rangeArray!=null and pager.rangeArray.length==2

mapper.select:
select
from mes_inspect_record T
select count(*) from mes_inspect_record T
select * from mes_inspect_record where id=#{id}

select
from mes_inspect_record T
mapper.update:
update mes_inspect_record
object_id=#{objectId},
object_name=#{objectName},
class_name=#{className},
object_type=#{objectType},
object_img_url=#{objectImgUrl},
institution_parent_name=#{institutionParentName},
institution_id=#{institutionId},
institution_name=#{institutionName},
happen_date=#{happenDate},
create_time=#{createTime},
record_user_id=#{recordUserId},
record_user_name=#{recordUserName},
record_user_type=#{recordUserType},
institution_desc=#{institutionDesc},
institution_score=#{institutionScore},
class_id=#{classId},
school_id=#{schoolId}
where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO mes_inspect_record ( id, object_id, object_name, class_name, object_type, object_img_url, institution_parent_name, institution_id, institution_name, happen_date, create_time, record_user_id, record_user_name, record_user_type, institution_desc, institution_score, class_id, school_id ) VALUES
( #{mesInspectRecord.id}, #{mesInspectRecord.objectId}, #{mesInspectRecord.objectName}, #{mesInspectRecord.className}, #{mesInspectRecord.objectType}, #{mesInspectRecord.objectImgUrl}, #{mesInspectRecord.institutionParentName}, #{mesInspectRecord.institutionId}, #{mesInspectRecord.institutionName}, #{mesInspectRecord.happenDate}, #{mesInspectRecord.createTime}, #{mesInspectRecord.recordUserId}, #{mesInspectRecord.recordUserName}, #{mesInspectRecord.recordUserType}, #{mesInspectRecord.institutionDesc}, #{mesInspectRecord.institutionScore}, #{mesInspectRecord.classId}, #{mesInspectRecord.schoolId} )
mapper.select: select T1.* from mes_institution T1 left join mes_user_auth_institution T2 on T1.id = T2.institution_id where T2.institution_parent_id = #{institutionParentId} and T2.user_id = #{userId}
select T1.teacher_id from jw_teacher_post T1 left join jw_student T2 on T1.class_id = T2.classes_id where T2.id = #{Sid} and T1.sort = 5
select teacher_id from jw_teacher_post where class_id = #{Cid} and sort = 5
select id, record_user_name, create_time, happen_date, institution_desc from mes_inspect_record where id=(select record_id from mes_institution_audit where id=#{auditId} limit 1)
mapper.update: update mes_inspect_record set institution_score='0' where id =(select record_id from mes_institution_audit where id=#{auditId} limit 1)
mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM mes_institution t1 inner join mes_time_status t2 on t1.time_status_id = t2.id inner join mes_user_auth_institution t3 on t1.id = t3.Institution_id where t3.user_id = #{userId} and t1.`level` = 1 and t3.`level` = 1 and t2.`status` = 1
mapper.update:
update mes_inspect_record set institution_score='0' where id in
#{recordId}
mapper.select: select T1.institution_name name,count(T1.institution_name) value from mes_inspect_record T1 left join mes_institution T2 on T1.institution_id = T2.id left join mes_time_status T3 on T2.time_status_id = T3.id where T1.school_id = #{schoolId} and T1.institution_score != 0 and T3.status = 1 and T1.happen_date between #{startDate} and now() group by T1.institution_id order by value desc

select T1.institution_parent_name,sum(T1.institution_score) sum from mes_inspect_record T1 left join mes_institution T2 on T1.institution_id = T2.id left join mes_time_status T3 on T2.time_status_id = T3.id where T1.school_id = #{schoolId} and T1.institution_score != 0 and T3.status = 1 and T1.happen_date between #{startDate} and now() group by T1.institution_parent_name order by T1.institution_parent_name

select id, object_name, object_img_url, institution_parent_name, institution_name, happen_date, create_time, institution_desc, institution_score, class_id, institution_id from mes_inspect_record where id=#{id}
select * from school_year where school_id = #{schoolId} and now() >= last_term_begin and now() < next_term_begin

select name AS institution_parent_name,0 as sum from mes_institution T1 left join mes_time_status T2 on T1.time_status_id = T2.id where T2.status = 1 and T1.school_id = #{schoolId} and T1.parent_id = '-1'

SELECT sum(T1.institution_score) from mes_inspect_record T1 LEFT JOIN mes_institution T2 ON T1.institution_id=T2.id LEFT JOIN mes_time_status T3 on T2.time_status_id=T3.id where
T1.institution_id=#{institutionId} and
T1.class_id=#{classId} and
T1.school_id = #{schoolId} and T1.happen_date >= #{beginTime} and T1.happen_date < #{endTime}

select T1.*,T3.status from mes_inspect_record T1 LEFT JOIN mes_institution T2 on T2.id=T1.institution_id LEFT JOIN mes_time_status T3 on T2.time_status_id=T3.id where T1.school_id=#{schoolId} and T1.class_id=#{classId} and T1.create_time >=#{beginTime} and T1.create_time <=#{endTime} order by T1.create_time DESC

select count(1) from mes_inspect_record T1 LEFT JOIN mes_institution T2 on T2.id=T1.institution_id LEFT JOIN mes_time_status T3 on T2.time_status_id=T3.id where T1.school_id=#{schoolId} and T1.class_id=#{classId} and T1.create_time >=#{beginTime} and T1.create_time <=#{endTime} order by T1.create_time DESC
select id from mes_institution_audit where record_id=#{recordId}

SELECT count(1) FROM mes_user_auth_institution AS muai LEFT JOIN mes_institution AS ms ON muai.institution_id = ms.id LEFT JOIN mes_time_status AS mts ON ms.time_status_id = mts.id WHERE mts.`status` = 1 AND muai.user_id = #{id} AND mts.school_id = #{schoolId}
select grade_name,number from jw_classes where id=#{classId}
select school_id from jw_student where id=#{studentId}
